description:
Skip the plastic bags. This reusable tote is made from salvaged fabric left over from making MEC backpacks. It crumples down small to fit in a pocket or purse, and its 20L capacity is perfect for groceries.

  • Nylon webbing handles let you carry it by hand or over your shoulder
  • Box stitch reinforcements add strength and durability
  • As these are made from off-cut fabrics leftover from making backpacks, the colour you receive may not be the colour shown
  • Sold as singles
name: MEC Waste-Less Tote Bag 20L
